title: Apple Developer Academy - Regional Support Engineer, IT (APAC)
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join a worldwide team responsible for the design, implementation, and management of IT environments across the world.
description:
- Contribute to the definition of all technical requirements to meet and exceed client computing, audio-visual and network needs
- Research, develop, implement, maintain and deliver training on new networking, client management and Audio Visual technologies...
key_qualifications:
3+ years of multi-site network management experience (large capacity WiFi, routers, switches)
Certifications with Cisco or Extreme networking technologies
Experience with pfSense or similar firewalls
Experience managing internal DNS services
Experience in client-management (macOS and iOS) technologies
Experience with Mobile Device Management
3+ years cloud-based Unix server management experience
Experience with Crestron Audio Visual Networks will be a plus
additional_requirements:
- Ability to travel nationally with occasional international travel
- Perform other job-related duties as assigned
- Proficiency read/write/speak/present in English is mandatory, Bahasa Indonesia is a bonus...
